# LeetDreamer

> A modular pipeline for generating narrated algorithm visualization videos from JSON scene specifications.

## Docs

- [Home](https://leetdreamer.dev/): Overview of the audio-first pipeline approach
- [Architecture](https://leetdreamer.dev/architecture): Pipeline stages, adapters, templates
- [Usage](https://leetdreamer.dev/usage): Scene specs, state properties, narration guidelines

## Key Concepts

- **Audio-first**: Generate TTS audio, extract durations, drive animation timing from audio
- **Adapters**: Swappable components for TTS, recording, merging
- **Scene specs**: JSON files with narration and visualization state per step
- **Templates**: Jinja2 HTML templates render the visualization
